title: Who is chosen for Alpha?
body: Are people chosen randomly for testing? I was wondering because for me the update screen just appeared when I opened the game.

replies.body: I think it's mostly random, but people who have been banned/chat restricted probably have Alpha restrictions placed on their accounts.

Well, I know that basically anyone who has PBE connected to their live account gets practically immediate access to the alpha. As far as how people are chosen i'm fairly certain it's just a lottery system.
